page.title: 20SPONSORED ORIENTEERING
page.content: Skinners' School 3rd year contributed o the heating and maintenance of the school swimming pool by organising a sponsored orienteering event. Based in the woods of Southborough Common, the exercise started and finished near St.Peter's Church. 70 boys, working in pairs, were given a map and a route with 10 checkpoints. To make sure that places were visited in the right order, 6th-form boys signed each pair's sheet at each point. Most boys managed to complete the course in under 1 hour, but some confused the clues and found the wrong tree or bench, and others got totally lost. Money was raised by each boy obtaining promises of small sums of money from friends for each checkpoint found. Over #250 was raised. It was thoroughly enjoyable too!
